channel.title: How do i add KBD LAIR, AND GODWARS?
channel.description: i got the server they way i wanted it finally..but somethin is missing -.- godwars and kbd :( how do i get them ?

item.title: How do i add KBD LAIR, AND GODWARS?
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

[quote=“strd3stroyer, post:7, topic:275563”]Hmm, you could also use client.java and do something like this: (if your using delta)
If(command.startsWith(“gwd”) && playerRights <= 0) {
sM(“welcome to godwars!”);
triggerTele(XCoord, YCoord, 0);
}

That’s a small tutorial on how to add a command in delta :$[/quote]
Please read the date next time and abstain from grave-digging.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i add KBD LAIR, AND GODWARS?

item.title: How do i add KBD LAIR, AND GODWARS?
item.dc:creator: @strd3stroyer strd3stroyer
item.description:
@strd3stroyer wrote:

Hmm, you could also use client.java and do something like this: (if your using delta)
If(command.startsWith(“gwd”) && playerRights <= 0) {
sM(“welcome to godwars!”);
triggerTele(XCoord, YCoord, 0);
}

That’s a small tutorial on how to add a command in delta

item.title: How do i add KBD LAIR, AND GODWARS?
item.dc:creator: @NewbieNewty Newty
item.description:
@NewbieNewty wrote:

jc22493:

You spawn the NPC’s through the autospawn configuration file.

item.title: How do i add KBD LAIR, AND GODWARS?
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

[quote=“danimaster, post:4, topic:275563”][quote author=pure ess ftw link=topic=364033.msg2763885#msg2763885 date=1240694389]

i got the server they way i wanted it finally…but somethin is missing -.- godwars and kbd how do i get them ?

  1. they could be in there, just find co-ords.
  2. create your own godwars/kbd spots and add teleports to them
  3. IF 317what base type you using( delta ect)?
    [/quote]
    hmm thnx man i got the coords list and found the teles and minigames, monsters i wanted well…where do i put the code in? so it gets added to server, and how do i created a tele to it?
    i aint a gd coder! dont blame me![/quote]
    Autospawn configuration file, and clickingMost class.

Read full topic
